review: Setup was fine, access to apps with no probs. Would like longer USB cord but no biggie. However, this skips, stutters, freezes, etc and it is no fun watching. It usually fixes itself after only a second or two but the sudden stops and starts if you are using the tv as background noise are jarring. Sometimes freezes take full power on/off sequence to fix. Also screen sometimes freezes while audio continues happily along. That always requires restart.  Since my Roku works perfectly from same spot I know these are Firestick issues.  Works fine for infrequent use. This guy will go in the guest room and my old Roku will get its job back. Expected more from Amazon.
